entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
